iti60:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti60:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three grounds for making merit.
iti60:2.3: Giving, ethical conduct, and meditation are all grounds for making merit.
iti60:2.4: These are the three grounds for making merit.”
iti60:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
